Airline: Sales Growth 2007 % = Growth rate comparing 2007 vs 2006
Sales Growth 2008 % = Growth rate comparing 2008 vs 2007
WestJet maintained highest growth in BOTH years (21.3% then 18.5%)
Singapore Airlines collapsed from 10.2% to 0.1% (Asian crisis impact)
Most airlines decelerated in 2008 due to financial crisis
Data source: Exhibit 10 - Comparative Financial Ratios, Line 25
